prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Guitar, Bass, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
Organ, Guitar, Bass, Drums, Chromatic Percussion - but no Piano - make up this song.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Organ, Guitar, Bass, Drums, and Chromatic Percussion, but Piano is absent.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Organ, Guitar, Bass, Drums, and Chromatic Percussion, Piano not included.
